founders.name: Thomas Standen
founders.background_summary: Tom Standen is the founder of Sylvi, a tech startup he has been building for over a year and a half. His background is academically strong, with a Master's in Physics from The University of Manchester and UCLA. Prior to founding Sylvi, he built a formidable corporate career in strategy and analytics, working at both IBM and, most recently, McKinsey & Company. This experience at elite consulting firms signals a high level of strategic and analytical capability. His recent content on LinkedIn is focused on building Sylvi in public, demonstrating significant momentum and founder-led credibility. Key posts highlight a recently closed £350k angel round from notable investors, a new key hire, and product development driven directly by community feedback. His tone is confident and modern, using creative formats (e.g., a football-style "transfer announcement" for a new hire) that suggest strong brand-building potential. The posts consistently generate good engagement, indicating a supportive and interested network. His focus on running design workshops with students suggests Sylvi may operate in the EdTech space.

previous_companies.description: Worked in strategy and analytics, contributing to high-level consulting projects.
Corporate career in analytics and strategy.

investment_criteria_assessment.assessment_summary: Tom Standen is a highly strategic and analytically strong founder with elite consulting experience at McKinsey & Company and IBM. He has not previously founded a relevant company before Sylvi, but demonstrates impressive credentials, strong industry fit, and a compelling, mission-aligned solution in the EdTech/tech space.
